name: Hacker Simulator (itch) (ASMEF Company)
description:
In this game you can hack the system with a password. However, the passwords are not in the correct order. These are the passwords that are spelled correctly. Different for each of the 4en pages there are passwords. You just have to enter them correctly and in no time you will see something. These are the passwords for the different pages:

1. local library: books, aisle, shelf, password, font, borrow.

2. police station: prisoner, handcuffs, holster, uniform, arrest.

3. NASA: starfield, telescop, environment, exploration, astronauts.

4.Mr.Lynx: hairbrush, hearing, european, mammal, wildcat.
